pages.text: 0 SCRATCH MADE GOODNESS. SCRATCH MADE GOODNESS. SCRATCH MADE GOODNESS. Learn more Treat yourself in the New Year with our Cookies & Cream Milkshake! Hand-spun with pieces of Oreo® cookies and layered with even more on top, its the perfect way to keep the post holiday blues away. Order Now WELCOME TO HUGH-BABY’S Hugh-Baby’s brings people together from all over to enjoy some of life’s simplest pleasures. We take great care in preparing signature items that are scratch-made, cooked to order, and speak to our mid-South roots. We’re all about celebrating the classics, delivering value, and throwing back to the beloved local barbecue andburger spots of our youth. ORDER ONLINE Y’ALL COME VISIT Visit Hugh-Baby’s in Nashville, TN, or Charleston, SC. Open Daily 11AM - 9PM Charlotte Ave. Nashville 4816 Charlotte Avenue,Nashville, TN 37209 Order Online Learn More Order Catering Hunters Station EAST Nashville 975 Main Street,Nashville, TN 37206 Order Online Learn More Order Catering BERRY HILLNashville 718 Thompson Lane,Nashville, TN 37204 Order Online Learn More Order Catering CharlestonSouth Carolina 1028 St. Andrews Blvd,Charleston, SC 29407 Order Online Learn More Order Catering Made from scratch, Daily Hugh-Baby’s burgers feature a proprietary blend of premium beef, ground fresh daily. Our slow-smoked Pulled Pork, Turkey, and Bologna follow the time-honored traditions of Memphis barbecue, and we smoke all the meat for our BBQ Sandwiches in-house every single day. Crispy, golden French Fries, gas station-style Hot Dogs, a killer house-made Veggie Burger, the Depression-era “Slugburger” (made famous in Corinth, Mississippi!), and hand-spun Milkshakes round out our intentionally small, straightforward menu. Our Menu FOLLOW HUGH-BABY’S ON INSTAGRAM FOLLOW US

0 Dine-In, PICK UP, and Delivery All Of Our Locations Offer Enjoy from anywhere you’d like! Warm, genuine Southern hospitality is at the heart of what we do. We welcome you to enjoy our food in our dining rooms, patios, or in the comfort of your own home. We offer multiple ways to order: at the Counter, Drive-Thru, Walk-Up Windows, Online, and via Delivery Partners. We hope to see you soon! Open Daily 11AM - 9PM CHARLOTTE AVE. 4816 Charlotte AvenueNashville, TN 37209 Menu & More Order Catering Order Pickup Order Delivery EAST NASHVILLE 975 Main StreetNashville, TN 37206 Order Pickup Order Delivery Order Catering Menu & More BERRY HILL, NASHVILLE 718 Thompson Ln.Nashville, TN 37204 Menu & More Order Catering Order Pickup Order Delivery CHARLESTON, SOUTH CAROLINA 1028 Saint Andrews BoulevardCharleston, SC 29407 Order Catering Menu & More Order Delivery Order Pickup

0 OUR MENU BURGERS Hugh-Baby’s burgers feature a custom blend of premium beef.Ground fresh daily & cooked to order.+ Add bacon or sliced cheese to any burger+Add an extra patty*Heirloom tomatoes only available while in season. CHEESEBURGER Beef Patty, American Cheese, Pickles, Lettuce, Onion, Heirloom Tomato, Comeback Sauce DOUBLE CHEESEBURGER Double Beef Patty, Double American Cheese, Pickles, Lettuce, Onion, Heirloom Tomato, Comeback Sauce BBQ BURGER Beef Patty, American Cheese, Slow-Smoked Pulled Pork, Grilled Onions, Hugh-Baby’s BBQ Sauce SHROOM & SWISS BURGER Swiss Cheese, Smoked Mushrooms, Yellow Mustard, Mayo VEGGIE BURGER* Housemade Veggie Patty with Smoked Black Beans, Mushrooms, & Cashews Patty, Swiss Cheese, Pickles, Lettuce, Onion, Heirloom Tomato, Comeback Sauce *Contains eggs & nuts! THE WORLD FAMOUS SLUGBURGER Made famous in Corinth, MS! Deep-Fried Ground Pork & Soy Meal, Pickles, Chopped Onions, Yellow Mustard Only available on Fridays! BBQ We follow the time-honored traditions of slow-smokingour pulled pork, turkey, and bologna over hickory coals every single day. PULLED PORK SANDWICH Cole Slaw, Hugh-Baby’s BBQ Sauce SMOKED TURKEY CLUB Swiss Cheese, Bacon, Lettuce, Heirloom Tomato, Honey Mustard BOLOGNA SANDWICH Yellow Mustard, Pickles, Onion SANDWICHES Southern Fried Goodness FRIED CHICKEN SANDWICH Crispy, Hand-Breaded Fried Chicken Thigh, Pickles,Comeback Sauce FRIED CATFISH SANDWICH Cornmeal-Breaded Fried Catfish Filet, Pickles, Coleslaw,Sliced Onions, Comeback Sauce Only offered at Charleston location! HOT DOGS An ode to the quintessential gas station hot dogs of our youth. BALL PARK DOG Sweet Relish, Yellow Mustard SLAW DOG Cole Slaw, Chopped Onions, Yellow Mustard,Chili Sauce CHILI CHEESE DOG Chili Sauce, Chopped Onions, Yellow Mustard,American Cheese PICKWICK DOG Grilled Onions and Jalapeños, Yellow Mustard, Mayo,Hugh-Baby’s BBQ Sauce FRIES FRENCH FRIES Crispy, Golden French Fries CHILI CHEESE FRIES French Fries, American Cheese, Chili Sauce SHAKES & DRINKS Hand-spun milkshakes featuring scratch-made chocolate, vanilla, strawberry, & seasonal flavors. MILKSHAKES House-made Vanilla, Chocolate, or Strawberry topped with Whipped Cream and a Cherry FRESH-SQUEEZED LEMONADE Fresh-Squeezed Daily ICED TEA Sweet or Unsweet CO'-COLAS Coca-Cola, Diet Coke, Sprite, Dr. Pepper, Powerade, Mello Yello, Orange Drink, Barq’s Root Beer KIDS DRINKS Soft Drink Choice or Iced Tea BOTTLED WATER Our menu is subject to change. Please alert our team to any allergies. View our Allergy Menu here . Our kitchen uses peanuts, tree nuts, soy, milk, eggs and wheat. While we take steps to minimize ingredient crossover, we're unable to guarantee our entire menu is safe for people with these allergies. Thank you!
